Hero no 1, Thanks for your work. I am getting no sound and haven't seen anyone else with this problem. I installed with origininstaller and removed the "tm". I get a flashing screen at startup but I can get thru that and play, but no sound. Any ideas?

zsfwaw:

when the window pops up asking for file 35 you have to mount disc 2,  open it and then open "GAME" file and click ok. This will extract the rest of the files. Then copy and paste the crack from disc 2 "CRACK" folder to install dir.

*NOTE TO ALL*
before installing you MUST remove the tiny (tm) from the default directory file name!!!!
